title: Coffee House Comics
description: A semester-long group project for CSE416 at SBU - a web-based community platform for creating and sharing comics & interactive stories.

title: Budget Manager
description: An Android app to help manage personal spending money by splitting into budgets and monitoring trends.

title: "Planet Stonedog"
description: An in-browser resource management game, made as a 24-hr SBUHacks hackathon project with some friends.

title: Magic IoT Orbs
description: A set of three IoT-connected orbs which all change color in sync whenever one of them is activated.

title: Auto-Watering System
description: An Arduino project designed to automate the process of watering several house plants.

title: Personal Website
description: A website to showcase my work and help people get to know me a little better.

title: Arch Linux Scripts
description: A collection of scripts to install and configure Arch Linux in an automated, customized way.

title: Top 5 Lister
description: A final project (individual) for the CSE316 Software Development course at SBU - a MERN web app which allows users to create, share, and view lists of their top 5 favorite items in any category they choose.

title: Colorful IoT Lamps
description: A set of IoT connected color-changing lamps, designed for some friends to facilitate staying connected through trying times.
